languages.text: "Мои старые ноги быстро не пойдут. Но я поковыляю следом. Все равно вам в бою не нужна старуха, путающаяся под ногами. А драться, я думаю, еще придется..."
"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."
languages.original_text: "Мои старые ноги быстро не пойдут. Но я поковыляю следом. Все равно вам в бою не нужна старуха, путающаяся под ногами. А драться, я думаю, еще придется..."

traits.locale_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you on my old legs. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way. And I think there will be more fighting for you to do yet..."

"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you on my old legs. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way. And I think there will be more fighting for you to do yet..."
"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."
"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."
"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."
"I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

languages.text: "Ich gehe nicht sehr schnell. Aber ich humpele hinter Euch her. Wenn es zu einem Kampf kommt, wollt Ihr ja sicher sowieso nicht, dass Euch eine alte Frau im Weg steht. Und es wird wohl noch mehrere Kämpfe geben ..."
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: "Ich gehe nicht sehr schnell. Aber ich humpele hinter Euch her. Wenn es zu einem Kampf kommt, wollt Ihr ja sicher sowieso nicht, dass Euch eine alte Frau im Weg steht. Und es wird wohl noch mehrere Kämpfe geben ..."

languages.text: « Je ne marche pas vite, mais je vais clopiner derrière vous. Si vous devez vous battre, vous préférerez ne pas avoir une vieille femme dans les pattes de toute façon. Et je pense qu'il va y avoir d'autres combats... »
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: « Je ne marche pas vite, mais je vais clopiner derrière vous. Si vous devez vous battre, vous préférerez ne pas avoir une vieille femme dans les pattes de toute façon. Et je pense qu'il va y avoir d'autres combats... »

languages.text: “我走得不快，但我会一瘸一拐地跟在你后面。反正，万一你们打起来了，您肯定不会想让一个老妇人挡住您的路。我觉得等会还会有不少战斗……”
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: “我走得不快，但我会一瘸一拐地跟在你后面。反正，万一你们打起来了，您肯定不会想让一个老妇人挡住您的路。我觉得等会还会有不少战斗……”

languages.text: 「私は速く歩けません。しかし、あなたの後をついていきます。戦闘に巻き込まれるなら、こんな老いぼれに邪魔されることもないでしょう。そして、きっと戦いはもっとあるでしょう…」
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: 「私は速く歩けません。しかし、あなたの後をついていきます。戦闘に巻き込まれるなら、こんな老いぼれに邪魔されることもないでしょう。そして、きっと戦いはもっとあるでしょう…」

languages.text: «No camino rápido. Pero cojearé detrás. Si acaban en una pelea, no querrán que una anciana se interponga en su camino. Y creo que habrá más combates...».
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: «No camino rápido. Pero cojearé detrás. Si acaban en una pelea, no querrán que una anciana se interponga en su camino. Y creo que habrá más combates...».

languages.text: "Hızlı yürüyemesem de aksaya topallaya gelirim peşinizden. Kocadım artık, çatışma neyim çıkarsa ayak bağı olurum zaten. Herhâlde çıkacak da..."
languages.original_text: "I'm no fast walker. But I'll hobble after you. If you get into a fight, it's not like you'll want an old woman to get in your way anyway. And I think there will be more fighting..."

traits.locale_text: "Hızlı yürüyen biri değilimdir fakat topallayarak da olsa peşinizden gelirim. Artık ihtiyarım, bir çatışma neyim çıksa ayağınıza bağ olurdum zaten. Zannımca çıkacak da..."
